Package shaders

Class StaticShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • shaders.ShaderProgram
      • shaders.StaticShader
  • public class StaticShader
extends ShaderProgram
    Shader for the static entities (trees, foliage, rocks). Implements simple phong model.
